Description:
Refreshing Henley home on 563m2
Located in the well sought-after SELANDRA RISE ESTATE is this immaculate Henley built home with quality finishes and fixtures throughout surrounded by beautiful established native trees and gardens. The functional floorplan offers 4 spacious bedrooms PLUS a study, 2 separate living areas, TWO fantastic entertainer's areas plus a generous backyard for the kids and pets to play!
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom inc. en-suite with double vanities, shower with rainwater fitting plus a large walk in robe with storage fit out.
- Three further bedrooms all serviced by built in robes.
- Separate study/ home office for those who work from home.
- 2 living areas to enjoy an open plan living area adjoining the dining space plus a separate theatre room at the rear.
- Stunning modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven with 5 burner cooktop, 20mm stone benches, dishwasher and a built in pantry.
- The indoor and outdoor areas blend seamlessly with a monster GRAND alfresco making entertaining a breeze overlooking the manicured landscaped gardens and gorgeous water feature.

- For security the home also includes a sensor alarm system as well as multiple outdoor sensor lights for peace of mind.
- LONG list of extras include: ducted central heating, split system A/C to Master bedroom, raised ceilings, downlights and upgraded modern stained doors, stone benches to both bathrooms, timber shutters throughout, composite weatherproof deck to both decking areas, stylish timber look laminate flooring, low maintenance landscaped gardens back and front, exposed aggregate concrete driveway, color bond roofing, 6 solar panels and much, much more!

This is the perfect choice for those looking for a quality family home in a well sought after location!
